title: More Like BAEllionaire! Gerber Baby Conspiracies 4.12.22
itunes:title: More Like BAEllionaire! Gerber Baby Conspiracies 4.12.22
description:
In episode 1224, Jack and Miles are joined by actor and TV writer Dani Fernandez to discuss… Billionaire Digest, Why Would Anyone Want Their Baby To Be The “Gerber Baby” Right Now? And more!

  1. Linda Honey Video
  2. Elon Musk Will Not Join Twitter’s Board, Company Says
  3. How the ​​‘Homeless Billionaire’ Became a Philosopher King
  4. Why Would Anyone Want Their Baby To Be The “Gerber Baby” Right Now?
  5. The Untold Truth Of The Gerber Baby
  6. Manufacturers allowed baby food contaminated with heavy metals to remain on shelves, lawmakers say
  7. Parents Erupt Over FDA Failure To Regulate Toxic Metals in Food
  8. Groundbreaking legal battle seeks to show toxic metals in baby food can cause autism

LISTEN: SubZero by Action Bronson

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
